data.name: Wisdom Watcher - EARLY ACCESS
data.description:
Wisdom Watcher, a VR action/shooter set in a clockpunk universe inspired by European folklore, offers diverse arenas and gameplay modes. Manage your arsenal of upgradable weapons and cards with unique abilities to challenge astral foes, achieve high scores, and climb leaderboards for rewards.

Wisdom Watcher is still in development, this is a fully playable early access version. 
Join our Discord community (https://discord.gg/bCVKz57hMe) and be part of the development!

Key Features:

Competitive Leaderboards with Rewards:
Engage in monthly and seasonal challenges. Excel in the arenas and climb the leaderboards to earn exclusive rewards.

Diverse Gameplay Modes:
Each new arena introduces new gameplay modes, ensuring a fresh and exciting experience.

Customizable Arsenal and Card System:
Refine your combat style with an arsenal of upgradable weapons with unique characteristics and abilities. Utilize cards for passive skills or to build strategic items like barricades.

A Dynamic World with Astute Adversaries:
The environment evolves constantly, the monsters exhibit social behaviors, undertake tasks, form alliances, and modify the surroundings, ensuring every game is a unique challenge.

Clockpunk Universe Inspired by European Folklore:
Immerse yourself in a dark fantasy world, drawing inspiration from European locations and tales.

VR Only with Stellar Performance:
Designed primarily for standalone VR, Wisdom Watcher lets you engage with hordes of over 20 mobs at once.
